official_title: To prohibit the closure, consolidation, or elimination of offices of the Environmental Protection Agency.
short_title: Recognizing the Environmental Gains In Overcoming Negligence Act

summary.text:
Recognizing the Environmental Gains In Overcoming Negligence Act or the REGION Act

This bill prohibits funds made available for any fiscal year from being used to close, consolidate, or eliminate an office of the Environmental Protection Agency, including a regional or program office.

titles.title: To prohibit the closure, consolidation, or elimination of offices of the Environmental Protection Agency.
Recognizing the Environmental Gains In Overcoming Negligence Act
